channel.title: Help please on TokkulScape 508 V3.5
channel.description:
Hi i've just downloaded tokkulscape and me and my friend want to play it i've compiled everything and ran ther server and also the client where it asks for my ip so i enter the no-ip i use but i just get "connecting to update server"
in the cmd box which pops up the client it says
ninescape 508 client error_game_js5connect
can someone help me please
BTW i can log on when i use 0.0.0.0

item.title: Help please on TokkulScape 508 V3.5
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

You must portforward before you can use a no-ip address.

Read full topic
